origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'CurrencyExchange.get_current_rate', 'description': 'Get the current exchange rate between two currencies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'from_currency', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the currency code to convert from.'}, {'name': 'to_currency', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the currency code to convert to.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'rate', 'description': 'the current exchange rate.'}]}, {'name': 'HistoricalData.get_rate_history', 'description': 'Get the historical exchange rate between two currencies over a specified period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'from_currency', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the currency code to convert from.'}, {'name': 'to_currency', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the currency code to convert to.'}, {'name': 'start_date', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the start date of the period in YYYY-MM-DD format.'}, {'name': 'end_date', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the end date of the period in YYYY-MM-DD format.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'history', 'description': 'a list of historical rates with dates.'}]}, {'name': 'FinancialProducts.get_swap_info', 'description': 'Get information about available foreign exchange swaps and currency swaps.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'swap_types', 'description': 'a list of available swap types.'}, {'name': 'swap_details', 'description': 'detailed information about each swap type.'}]}, {'name': 'HedgingStrategy.recommend_strategy', 'description': 'Recommend a hedging strategy based on current and historical exchange rates.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'current_rate', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the current exchange rate.'}, {'name': 'historical_rates', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'a list of historical rates with dates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'recommended_strategy', 'description': 'the recommended hedging strategy.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要对冲日元兑澳元的汇率风险。首先，获取当前日元兑澳元的汇率。接着，分析过去一年内日元兑澳元汇率的波动情况。然后，提供一些外汇掉期和货币互换的信息。最后，基于当前汇率和波动情况，推荐一个适合的对冲策略。
